titles.title: Superfund Polluter Pays Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the financing of the Superfund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
9/23/2008--Introduced.
Superfund Polluter Pays Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code by reinstating until January 1, 2017, the Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate and the corporate environmental income tax.
